title: How do I get in contact with your team?
body: Please visit the Contact us page and fill out the presented form.

title: How do I register for a new account?
body: You can visit our Registration page to fill out your details for a new account. This page can be accessed via the profile picture in the top right of the website and pressing "Login".

title: How do I create a License Request as a Customer?
body: On the Customer Dashboard page, under the "Licenses" header, there is a button labeled "Create Request".

title: How do I approve/deny a License Request as a Business Owner?
body: On the Business Dashboard page, under the "License Requests" header, you can view and accept/deny each request.

title: How do I create a Product as a Business Owner?
body: On the Business Dashboard page, under the "Products" header, there is the ability to create Products.

title: What if I have so many Products/Licenses that they do not fit on one page?
body: We have implemented a search feature for this reason. The search bar can be used to query any items that cannot immediately be seen.

title: How will I know if my License Request has been approved, or if someone has requested a License from me?
body: There is a notifications system that exists in the top right of any webpage - through this feature, any notification will be passed onto you.
